actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that the Windfall Profits Tax Reduction Provisions contained in the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 be repealed.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the expected U.S. budget deficit should be reduced by amending the windfall profit tax reduction provisions contained in the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that the Windfall Profits Tax Reduction Provisions contained in the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 be repealed.
